DIA_MaleBath_Hello_03_02: Please, shed those dirty clothes and make yourself at home in our establishment!
DIA_MaleBath_Hello_03_03: Our heated water is enriched with various therapeutic preparations. Not only will you take care of your cleanliness, but also your physical health.
DIA_MaleBath_Cost_15_01: How much will it cost me?
DIA_MaleBath_Cost_03_02: By the grace of our gracious Governor Morris, the bathhouse is available absolutely free to all who wish to use it.
DIA_MaleBath_Cost_03_03: As long as they behave appropriately of course! Unfortunately I've already had a few unpleasant incidents here...
